changelog: 🔍 Added SEO settings panel, JSON-LD, and custom sitemap
🖼 Optimized image handling with WebP and picture element support
🎨 Reworked SCSS variables for spacing and color consistency
📦 Refactored Hero section and templates to use flexible components
🧩 Created options page and ACF group for hotel advantages
🆕 Added new SVG icons for outline and solid categories
🛠 Improved Vite manifest handling and updated enqueue logic
